  • Constructor Details

    • Movie

      public Movie​(java.lang.String theTitle)
      Default constructor to initialize the Movie title
      Parameters:
      theTitle - title of the movie

    • Movie

      public Movie​(java.lang.String title, java.lang.String synopsis, java.lang.String director, java.lang.String language, java.lang.String type, java.lang.String PGrating, java.lang.String status, java.lang.String overallRating, java.lang.String cast)
      Parametrised constructor to initialize a movie by setting each attribute of a movie
      Parameters:
      title - Title of the movie
      synopsis - Synopsis of the movie
      director - Director of the movie
      language - Language of the movie
      type - Movie type among 2D, 3D and blockbuster
      PGrating - MoviePG Rating PG, PG-13, G and R
      status - Showing status of the movie: Coming soon, Preview, Now showing or End of showing
      overallRating - Overall Rating of the movie based on past reviews
      cast - Cast of the movie
